-1.title: The Grind

episode of.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay (TV Series 2015– )

-1.plot: The season is winding down and the crews are showing the wear and tear of salmon fishing. Meanwhile, Luke rescues a fellow captain and his crew when their boat catches on fire.

1.title: Let the Battle Begin!

episode of.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Every salmon season on Bristol Bay is a war, but this year promises to be legendary. The price is historically high, the stocks of fish are huge and the only thing guaranteed is a battle on the bay.

2.title: The Big Gamble

episode of.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: High-powered high-liner Taran fires up his boat's dual jet engines to scour the bay and nets a promising first haul in Naknek. In Egegik, Luke and crew are dead in the water as they race to get the broken down boat the Jimmy Jeff back in action.

3.title: Bristol Bay Jackpot!

episode of.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Kicking off the fishing in the Naknek district, the Ferrigno family quickly sets the bar with a monster haul. Also in Naknek, the high-octane Thunder is hot on the Salmon trail, but a freak encounter with another boat causes a terrible reversal of fortune

4.title: A Whale of a Catch

episode of.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The darkest day of Captian Luke's career turns to sunshine with some help from Mother Nature. In the Naknek district to the north, fishing starts strong for the Thunder but after a series of empty nets they set out for new - but risky - territory.

imdb.plot outline: In the desolate outreaches of Bristol Bay, Alaska, the most competitive fishing season on Earth takes place throughout four short weeks. ALASKA: BATTLE ON THE BAY submerges viewers within a high-stakes fishing drama as 1,800 captains and their crews draw the battle lines to help save Alaska's ecosystem by reeling in a massive sockeye salmon payday. With potential fortune swimming just below the surface, five captains prepare to battle the unforgiving bay, the battering ram of boats jockeying for position and the law, which strictly monitors the season with recon choppers and police squads. On the bay, fishing for the nearly 44 million salmon is necessary for the environment, and arm of the law is long, tempers are short and every single decision is the difference between drawing a huge income and settling for pennies.
imdb.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay

With potential fortune swimming just below the surface, five captains prepare to battle the unforgiving bay, the battering ram of boats jockeying for position and the law, which strictly monitors the season with recon choppers and police squads.
